Marylanders Rally to Secure Our Elections at the Secure the Vote Act Lobby Day - Secure The Vote MD

January 13, 2026 citizen-action
Rescheduled to Wednesday, February 4 at 9:00 a.m. , Marylanders will gather on Lawyers Mall in Annapolis for Secure the Vote Act Lobby Day , a grassroots effort to advance meaningful election security reform. Secure the Vote MD (STVMD) has identified more than 236,000 voter registration violations , revealing widespread inaccuracies and significant bloating in Maryland’s voter rolls. These findings underscore the urgent need for sound, comprehensive election security legislation to ensure accuracy, integrity, and public trust in our elections. Article here STVMD is working with the Maryland Freedom Caucus to introduce the Secure the Vote Act of 2026 , a comprehensive package of election integrity measures designed to restore transparency and public confidence in Maryland’s elections. The legislation addresses key vulnerabilities in the system, with a focus on three foundational safeguards: Voter ID , citizen verification , and in-person voting . Lobby Day will give constituents the opportunity to learn more about the bill, engage directly with lawmakers, and publicly demonstrate support for common-sense election protections. Organizers emphasize that secure elections are not a partisan issue, but a prerequisite for a healthy democracy. Supporters are encouraged to attend, stand with fellow Marylanders, and help move the Secure the Vote Act forward because trust in elections begins with integrity at the ballot box. Let us know you are joining us: /register-for-lobby-day-jan-27/#register-now
